content: --भद्रः {1} the car of Viṣṇu. {2} a bamboo. {3} a kind of verse artificially arranged; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} see <ls>Ki. 15. 25.</ls> {4} a temple or palace having openings on four sides; ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also in this sense). {5} the {%Nimba%} tree. {6} a kind of military array. (--द्रा a dancing girl, an actress.
